about_the_game:
Bolide is an arcade roguelike where you survive waves in space to unlock new skills! Completing waves earns you skill points, which are spent on a variety of skills! With tons possible skill combinations, 40+ skills, 10 modes, 500+ customization options, lots of modifiers, and more, every game will be unique!

40+ Unique Skills! Create new skill combinations every game! The possibilities are endless!

10 Unique Game Modes! Including Hardcore, Limited Ammo, Time Attack, Collector, and more, there's something for every mood. Plus, customize gameplay with modifiers, so it's as easy or hard as you'd like.

Over 500 Customization Options! Unlock new animated ships and customize your ship's color and supercharged status. Also, unlock new bullets, customize bullets, and supercharge them!

Challenge Waves. Hard waves with unique modifiers that will make you want to rage.

30+ Steam Achievements! Go for the gold!

20+ Steam Stats!

Fully customizable keybinds. You can even bind multiple (or all) controls to a single key.

Accessibility features, including an option for a simplified font, disabling challenge waves, and more.

Amazing music by the award-winning composer Andrew Piland.

Cloud Saves and more! Play Bolide today!

short_description: Bolide is an arcade roguelike where you survive waves in space to unlock new skills! Destroy rocks and survive challenging waves to earn skill points and use them to choose from a variety of skills. Pick from 40+ skills, allowing you to create lots of skill combinations!
